Title: FUNC-01: Verify PA Import supports new fields

Step Action: Open PA import UI
Step Expected: PA import UI opens successfully

Step Action: Upload a CSV file with new fields (Suggested Date; Parent Activity Tag; Systems/subsystems; Areas/Locations; Assets)
Step Expected: File uploads successfully and fields are recognized

Step Action: Map CSV columns to respective fields in the import tool
Step Expected: Mapping is successful and fields are displayed correctly

Step Action: Submit the import
Step Expected: Import completes successfully and confirms the number of records imported

Step Action: Verify the imported records in the system
Step Expected: Records contain correct data for all new fields (Suggested Date; Parent Activity Tag; Systems/subsystems; Areas/Locations; Assets)

Title: FUNC-02: Verify PA Export includes new fields

Step Action: Open PA export UI
Step Expected: PA export UI opens successfully

Step Action: Select the export template that includes the new fields
Step Expected: Template is successfully selected

Step Action: Export the data in the updated format
Step Expected: Export completes successfully

Step Action: Verify the exported file includes new fields (Suggested Date; Suggested Date By; Suggested Date Entry; Parent Activity Tag; Systems/subsystems; Areas/Locations; Assets)
Step Expected: Exported file contains all expected fields in correct format

Title: FUNC-03: Verify PA edit form shows imported associations

Step Action: Import a PA record with systems/subsystems; areas/locations; assets
Step Expected: Import completes successfully

Step Action: Open the imported PA record in edit form
Step Expected: Edit form opens successfully

Step Action: Verify the parent plant and process areas are displayed based on the imported associations
Step Expected: Edit form displays correct parent plant and process areas

Title: VAL-01: Validate PA import with missing required fields

Step Action: Upload a CSV file with missing mandatory fields (e.g.
Step Expected: Suggested Date)
COS Reference: Import fails with validation error highlighting missing fields

Step Action: Correct the file by adding the missing fields and re-upload
Step Expected: Import completes successfully

Title: VAL-02: Validate PA import with invalid field values

Step Action: Upload a CSV file with invalid data types (e.g.
Step Expected: text in date fields)
COS Reference: Import fails with validation error specifying the invalid fields

Step Action: Correct the invalid data and re-upload
Step Expected: Import completes successfully

Title: UI-01: Verify PA import UI layout and labels

Step Action: Open PA import UI
Step Expected: All fields and labels match the design specifications; help text is present

Step Action: Verify logical tab order and accessibility of the UI
Step Expected: All fields are accessible via keyboard and screen readers

Title: UI-02: Verify PA export UI layout and labels

Step Action: Open PA export UI
Step Expected: All fields and labels match the design specifications; help text is present

Step Action: Verify logical tab order and accessibility of the UI
Step Expected: All fields are accessible via keyboard and screen readers

Title: NEG-01: Verify PA import with incorrect file format

Step Action: Attempt to upload a non-CSV file (e.g.
Step Expected: .txt or .xlsx)
COS Reference: System rejects the file and displays an appropriate error message

Step Action: Attempt to upload a CSV file with incorrect column headers
Step Expected: System rejects the file and displays an appropriate error message

Title: NEG-02: Verify PA import with duplicate records

Step Action: Upload a CSV file containing duplicate records
Step Expected: System identifies and rejects duplicate records with an appropriate error message

Step Action: Verify non-duplicate records are imported successfully
Step Expected: Non-duplicate records are imported and displayed correctly

Title: REG-01: Verify existing PA import functionality is not broken

Step Action: Upload a valid CSV file with only existing fields (without new fields)
Step Expected: Import completes successfully

Step Action: Verify the imported records in the system
Step Expected: Records contain correct data for all existing fields

Title: REG-02: Verify existing PA export functionality is not broken

Step Action: Export data using an existing export template (without new fields)
Step Expected: Export completes successfully

Step Action: Verify the exported file includes only existing fields
Step Expected: Exported file contains correct data for all existing fields
